article.title: Northrop Grumman to Support Joint Tactical Ground Station
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Northrop Grumman Systems, Azuza, California, was recently awarded a $24 million contract for additional direct productive person hours of engineering services in support of the Joint Tactical Ground Station program.Â The U.S. Army Space and Missile Defense Command, Huntsville, Alabama, is the contracting activity.
